name: Boozy Baking with Early Dark Wines
description:
Craving cookies? We've got what you knead! 
 
SIS is doing its very first Boozy Baking Workshop at Soda Bottle Opener Wala with Early Dark! 
 
Date: 11th August 
Time: 4-7 pm 
Location: Soda Bottle Opener Wala 
 
To give you a brief idea about what you can expect at the event: 
 
 
 The bakery chef will begin by demonstrating the cookie-making process for 2 types of cookies 
 Participants will follow along and create their own cookies 
 The chef will provide tips and techniques to make this a fulfilling experience for you 
 
 
Added perks: 
A complimentary glass of wine from Early Dark 
 
Chicken Farcha and Aloo Aunty's Veg Cutlet as pass arounds 
Soft beverage options like Kokum Soda/ Irani Chai/ Pheteli Coffee are available for those who don't prefer drinks 
 
  
 
If sipping a glass of wine and baking some cookies sounds appealing, then we've got the perfect plan for your Sunday evening! 
Get ready to unleash your inner cookie monster! 
 
We're super excited! Are you ? 
 
Can't wait to see you on Sunday!

location.name:
SodaBottleOpenerWala
Plot Number 25, 4, Lavelle Road, opposite Harley Davidson Showroom, D' Souza Layout, Ashok Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001
